The challenge difficulty. Currently it determines how fast the disarming process get harder:
- Easy: every 3 cycles (increases at 4, 7, 10...)
- Normal: every 2 cycles (increases at 3, 5, 7...)
- Hard: every 1.5 cycles (rounded up, increases at cycle 3, 4, 6, 7...)

In this mode, the difficulty keeps increasing indefinitely without any cap.
